name: Amp Idea
overview:
Amp Idea specializes in providing interactive digital advertising in taxis for business owners. By developing a target marketing structure that personalizes the communication between businesses and their consumers, Amp Idea makes it possible to reach a captured audience with vivid advertising content. By changing the norm of a traditional taxi ride, our medium will change the way consumer view their taxi ride.

We have developed a platform that personalizes the communication between businesses and consumers by adding interaction to the outdoors advertising world. With traditional media on the decline, our in-cab interactive screens allow advertisers to launch a campaign with the needed flexibility and effectiveness.

It is one of the most innovative and flexible mediums in the market today. It brings the interaction and personalization available through online advertisement and the reach available through outdoor advertisement together. It is a hybrid that mixes these to elements to create an experience for the consumer.
